title: Storytelling w/Steve Brown | Ep. 14
itunes:title: Storytelling w/Steve Brown | Ep. 14
description:
DC Young Fly is on tour so Karlous invited his veteran OG comedian friend Steve Brown to the studio to talk all things comedy. He's had run ins with everyone in the game and has a story to go with it. From Katt Williams to Rickey Smiley. A few more n-word please awards are given out as well. Listen in then tell your cousin's momma to subscribe!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
